page.title: 082 FARMS IN CHILMARK/TEFFONT
page.content:
In{Teffont Magna,}one{large farm}of over{1,000 acres}specialises in crops grown under contract for{seed. {600 acres}of{winter wheat}is grown for seed, and the rest of the farm is under{barley}for malting and for seed, {oilseed rape, sugar beet and peas}for seed.{No animals}are kept except for a few bullocks for the farmer's own consumption, his dogs and riding horses. Cleeve Farm, Chilmark has{450 acres}of arable, mostly{winter wheat and barley but including{70 acres of oats}for feed and some{peas. 68 acres of grass support about 100{store cattle}and{150 {sheep. Silage}is made in summer. Both farms preserve game for{shooting.
AMcG
